name: The Last Bean (RamCid)
description:
This game is a project submited for the GoGodotJam 2021.

Instructions:

Control your character with the WASD keys. Shoot with Space Bar or Ctrl. Aim with the mouse and change weapons with number 1, 2 and 3

Kill enemies to earn points and buy guns and plants that help you hold the enemy army until you can climb the beanstalk and reach the clouds.
